profiles-collection.certifiable-skills: Number of skills eligible for certification

organization-invitation-email.title: You are invited to join Pix Orga
organization-invitation-email.subtitle: With the Pix Orga platform, create and manage testing campaigns and monitor the progress of your participants.
organization-invitation-email.pixPresentation: Pix is the online service to assess, develop and certify your digital skills.
organization-invitation-email.doNotAnswer: This is an automated email message, please do not reply.
organization-invitation-email.needHelp: Have questions? We’re here to help, contact us

pix-account-creation-email.title: Your Pix account has been created !
pix-account-creation-email.subtitle: You can now start testing your skills.
pix-account-creation-email.disclaimer: If you did not create this account, you can ask its deletion
pix-account-creation-email.pixPresentation: Pix is the online public service to assess, develop and certify your digital skills.
pix-account-creation-email.doNotAnswer: This is an automated email message, please do not reply.
pix-account-creation-email.askForHelp: Any questions? We’re here to help, contact us

params.title: Reset your password
params.weCannotSendYourPassword: Hello, for security reasons, we cannot send your password by email.
params.clickOnTheButton: Click on the button below to choose a new password.
params.linkValidFor: This link is valid for 24 hours. If you did not request to change your password, please ignore this email.
params.pixPresentation: Pix is the online public service to assess, develop and certify your digital skills.
